title: Novice Adventurer Marle and the Slime Rin - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Slice of Life   Yuri
author: 鬼影スパナ
description:
Marle accepted a request to deliver a letter to the neighboring town together with her familiar, the slime Rin. Marle and Rin thought this would be just a simple request of delivering a letter, but on the fourth day, Marle was in an absurd pinch.

「…… Help me, Rin-chan! I want to take a bath!」

Right, walking for four days without taking a bath, Marle was nearing the dangerous area as a girl. The proposal Rin had to such Marle was――

「…… Then, would you like to enter me~?」>
